price: 98. Vuestra única divinidad es Al-lah, no hay nada ni nadie que merezca ser adorado excepto Él, y Su conocimiento abarca todas las cosas.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumu al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa wasiʿa kulla shayin ʿil'man
